name: Grand Theft Life
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/grand-theft-life

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43

Theme: Your life is currency

Grand Theft Life is a game about spending your life doing stuff.

Get EDUCATED, WORK and make money, pursue ART or SCIENCE or commit CRIME.

Doing stuff spends YEARS of your life. How you choose to play is up to YOU!

Good luck and remember, there is more to life than going POSTAL (although it is an option).

Controls:

Move: L-click

Use weapon: R-click
